/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene below.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. Parked cars line the side of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day.

The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and routine, a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing.
